title: Ticket #2375: condor_config.generic should contain COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE
description: If you're setting COLLECTOR_HOST to use a port of 0 (automatically select a free port, useful for personal Condors and glideins), you need COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE to be set. Since the cost to having a COLLECTOR_ADDRESS_FILE set is so small (a small file appears on disk), this should be the default, as MASTER_ADDRESS_FILE and others already are.
